title: Set up Refund Direct Deposit
description: A taxpayer is due a refund and wants it deposited directly into their checking account.

tasks.description: Finalize the tax return to confirm the refund amount.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the final refund value.

tasks.description: Collect the taxpayer's bank account information (routing and account number).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent securely collects the bank details.

tasks.description: Enter the direct deposit information into the tax return before filing.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly inputs the banking information into the designated fields on the return.
